query:
SELECT ne.id, ne.nozzleNumber, ne.nozzleDescription, ne.nominalSize, ne.actualThickness, ne.minRequiredThickness 
FROM nozzleEvaluations ne
JOIN inspections i ON ne.inspectionId = i.id
WHERE i.vesselId LIKE '%57-11-001%'
ORDER BY ne.nozzleNumber;
